description: Quantitative priors for population dynamics, ecosystem function, biodiversity, and climate-ecology interactions

priors.source: Mora et al. 2011, estimated total eukaryotic species on Earth
De Vos et al. 2015, background extinction rate (extinctions per million species-years)
Pimm et al. 2014, current extinction rate 100-1000x background
Zhao et al. 2005, global terrestrial net primary production
Friedlingstein et al. 2022, Global Carbon Budget ocean CO2 uptake
Lindeman 1942, ~10% energy transfer between trophic levels
Hughes et al. 2017, 1C above max monthly mean triggers bleaching
Verhulst 1838, maximum growth rate at N = K/2
Newbold et al. 2016, global average BII has declined ~25%
